events.comment: * Initialize at the start of the Scene
* Debug
* Start by setting the Checkpoint var to 0 and removing the Player weapons
* Update the Quest UI Text
* Create a bunch of physic objects when passing a determined trigger
*** Needs to use Spawner instead
* Add the Particle/Health system back to the Barrel objects for this specific case
*** BUG *** Doesn't activate the Explosion property?
* Set Spawner to True to not re-creating new objects again
* Softlock check for the last room: if there's less than 3 Crate object inside the zone, spawn a new one
*** BUG *** Not working with the Custom function, needs to be changed with a normal Button
* Reached the Final Checkpoint, teleport back to the main area

* Complete the Shooting Range challenge. 30 seconds to reach the determined score.

--- BUTTON ID TO ACTIVATE THE QUEST IS 123 ---

Targets = 100 points; Bullseye = 150 points.

Activates once the Button is pressed: starts a Timer on countdown and spawn the Targets.

If Time is > 30 secs or Points < 1500, quest fails. Press the Button again to retry.

If Points > 1500, quest done. You can retry it again to beat the High Score by pressing again the Button.
*** BUG *** Quest still Completed even if the Scene is restarted --> set the Global Vars to Scene
* Initialize
* Debug
* Check if the Quest has already been completed
* The related Button in the Map has been pressed, activate the Trigger
* Hide the Button and Trigger under the ground
* Set a Countdown of 4 seconds (1 for the message, 3 for the countdown) to prepare the Player
* Show the Quest Timer, set a ready message on the 1st second, hide the Marker
* Begin the Quest
* Start the first Countdown
* Update the Countdown text with the remaining seconds
* Countdown is over
* Set a new Countdown of 21 seconds (1 for the message, 20 for the main quest) for the Shooting targets
*  Show the Score Text and set a starting message on the 1st second
* Reset the Score, start the Quest
* Turn off the Begin phase
* Start the main Countdown
* Update the Countdown text with the remaining seconds
* Activate the related Spawner Zone
* The Spawn Zone starts spawning Targets
* Main Countdown is over
* Finish text
* De-activate the Spawner and delete all remaining Targets
* Start the Result phase
* Turn off the Starting phase
* Give the Result: check the Points
* If Points > 1500, terminate successfully the Quest
* If Points < 1500, the Quest fails and the Player can retry by pressing the Button again

parameters: "Your Score: " + quest2_scorePoints + NewLine() + "YOU LOST! Try again."

parameters:
zone_spawner.id + " ; " +
zone_spawner.spawnProperty + " ; " +
zone_spawner.isActivated + " ; " +

ToString(zone_spawner.ObjectSpawner::TimeBeforeSpawn()) +
NewLine() +
"Entities? " + ToString(SceneInstancesCount(entity_spawner)) +
" ; " +
ToString(entity_spawner.X()) + " ; " + ToString(entity_spawner.Y()) + " ; " + ToString(entity_spawner.Object3D::Z())
